pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Independent Component Analysis: a Multi-Scale Sparse Non-Orthogonal Data-Driven Basis // It implements HICA (Hierarchical Independent Component Analysis) algorithm. This approach, obtained through the integration between treelets and Independent Component Analysis, is able to provide a multi- scale non-orthogonal data-driven basis, whose elements have a phenomenological interpretation according to the problem under study.
